HI I AM A PRODUCT OF YEARS OF MALICIOUS HEROIN ADDICTION WHEN MY MOTHER FINALLY GOT TOO DRUNK TO HANDLE MY ABUSIVE DAD WHO TORE HOLES IN HIS CONDOM AND THEN MADE ME

THE HAPPY LITTLE ACCIDENT!!!

ASK ME ANYTHING IM HAPPY TO ANSWER
